EmailTemplate.name: National Parks
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi SENDER, (Can you please put in recipient first name – the Outfitters have to type it for every single canned response that they send)
Thanks for reaching out! YETI is proud to support the National Park Foundation, the official charity of America’s national parks and nonprofit partner of the National Park Service. Celebrating their 50th anniversary, the National Park Foundation enriches America’s national parks and programs through private support, safeguarding our heritage and inspiring generations of national park enthusiasts.
As an official partner, YETI works in collaboration with the National Park Foundation to offer licensed designs celebrating the rich history of our national parks and bringing awareness to the places we love. The National Park Foundation receives a royalty from the sale of all licensed products. We are committed to working with the National Park Foundation to provide critical support to ensure our national parks can be enjoyed now and always.
For further information on the National Park Foundation and their mission, please visit: https://www.nationalparks.org/
Thanks again for your email, we hope you enjoy our newest collection!
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname}
The YETI Outfitters
512.394.9384
customerservice@yeti.com
yeti.com
